title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood [xvid .avi] Eclipse Hardsub+OVA
description:
These are fan-subs of the show that were ripped from satellite on their original air dates and encoded by now defunct Eclipse speedsubs. 

That means Japanese audio, Japanese titles, and a channel watermark. These are Standard Definition AVI files with the sub track hard-coded to the file.

If you want this show in its original format, With quality Subtitles, In a file-type that will play on anything and has a small file-size for archiving... AND if you don't care for or about the Funimation Dub... Then this is the Torrent for you!  

Eclipse also encoded these files as HD mkv's with Soft Subs, but I had an unfortunate data loss. The Eclipse Tracker is down now, and all the public torrents seem to be dead.(My listing got a DMCA Take-down) Luckily I still had These AVI's backed up on my PlayStation. If only PS3 could play MKV's, I might still have my 720p encodes... C'est la Vie.

The OVA's are from BT. They are 720p MKV Files encoded from BR with Dual Audio and Soft Subtitles. Thanks to Daman4Life for his OVA Torrent.

Alchemist BrotherHood OVA Collection BDRip [1280x720 Dual-Audio]
